name: Space Anomalies!
description:
Pilot your black hole star ship up and down using the arrow keys to collect the space anomalies!

Space anomalies collected will appear at the top in your black hole accumulator!

Controls:

Up Arrow - Pilot Ship Up
Down Arrow - Pilot Ship Down

Left-Click Mouse - Agitate Anomalies

Credits:

[LOFI CHIP-HOP MACHINE] Music Tracker to Create Sounds - https://fricochet.itch.io/chiphop

Notes:

Built to explore Unity's new DOTS stack preview packages and test performance capabilities!
